title: KKND: Krush Kill 'N Destroy Xtreme for PC
material_description: CD-ROM videogame. CD-ROM and CD jewel case with insert
brief_description: A Windows re-release KKND: Krush Kill ‘N Destroy, KKND: Xtreme retains the same gameplay but features more missions, multiplayer maps, a Kaos skirmish mode and updated graphics.
